item.title: Aluchi bhaji (अळूची पातळ भाजी)
item.description: English Aluchi patal bhaji Ingredients: 2-3 leaves of taro, 3-5 garlic, 5 tablespoons soaked gram pulses, Thin slices of dried coconut, 1 tablespoon soaked peanuts, A pinch and a little more jaggery than a finer lemon, Half a teaspoon of chili, 1 tbsp.
